00086 class Cfg_Base
00087 {
00088 public:
00094     Cfg_Base( const wxString& keyname )
00095      : m_key( keyname ),
00096        m_changed( false )
00097     {}
00098 
00102     virtual ~Cfg_Base() {}
00103 
00107     virtual void LoadFromFile(wxConfigBase* cfg) = 0;
00111     virtual void SaveToFile(wxConfigBase* cfg) = 0;
00112 
00118     virtual bool TransferFromWindow()   { return false; }
00124     virtual bool TransferToWindow()     { return false; }
00125 
00136     virtual bool ConnectToWidget( int WXUNUSED(id), wxWindow* WXUNUSED(parent) = NULL ) { return false; }
00137 
00143     virtual const wxString& GetKey()    { return m_key; }
00144 
00145 
00151     virtual bool HasChanged()           { return m_changed; }
00152 
00153 
00154 protected:
00160     virtual void SetChanged( bool changed )
00161     {
00162         m_changed = changed;
00163     };
00164 
00165 private:
00166 
00168     wxString    m_key;
00169 
00171     bool        m_changed;
00172 };
